reviewText: Although each scene of the episode maybe fast, but the movie is pretty good too! Maybe one day that I maybe having episode discs in each case!

After the DVD release of Turn A Gundam, RightStuf decided to release the two movies as well. This two-disc set covers Movie I: Earth Light and Movie II: Moonlight Butterfly. While extremely fast-paced, these movies summarize the Turn A Gundam series. There is minimal new footage and some of the story is changed slightly but otherwise it's merely a summary. While not a necessary release to get, it's a good way to have and watch Turn A Gundam if you want to see it but it's not exactly your style of Gundam show.

I cannot believe the bad reviews this is getting. Rightstuf inc. announced that the Turn A Gundam releases would be sub only. The actual product itself is great. The two featured movies are a retelling of the series at a faster pace. If you are a fan of Turn A Gundam this collection is a great way to complete the series.

A recap of the series in movie format.

Yes it's SUBBED.
If you don't mind subtitles then this is a good hodge podge of the Turn A series
